name: A Crash Course to the Galaxy
name_original: A Crash Course to the Galaxy
description:
Control your rocket with the A+D keys for rotation and Spacebar for thrusting!

Play in fullscreen for the best experience.

A rocket obstacle-course game I created while going through the Unity & C# course by Gamedev.tv. I added several features that were my own idea beyond the course, and it was fun learning things myself and figuring out the solutions to problems I never knew I could have. I had other ideas for the game and could have added more levels as well, but I'm going to move forward with the course at this time. 

I am very open to any feedback you could give me about how I did!
